meanings.definition: Baccies (noun): plural form of baccy, meaning tobacco.
meanings.sent1: I bought a pack of baccies for my uncle.
meanings.sent2: The store sells different types of baccies.
meanings.sent3: My grandpa enjoys the smell of baccies in his pipe.
meanings.sent4: The room was filled with the sweet scent of baccies.
meanings.sent5: The baccies in the jar looked like tiny brown leaves.

meanings.definition: Baccies (verb): third person singular present of baccy, meaning to smoke tobacco.
meanings.sent1: He baccies every evening after dinner.
meanings.sent2: She often baccies with her friends at the park.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed curious about the way he baccies.
meanings.sent4: The chimney puffed out smoke as he baccies inside.
meanings.sent5: The old man slowly baccies his pipe, lost in thought.
